betterquesting:10.desc:8:
[quest]The Solar Factory![/quest]

The structure has tiers, each of which allow greater production than the previous tier. 

Recipes in NEI display the minimum wafer tier required. 
Wafer Tiers: 

§6Monocrystalline
Phosphorous
Naquadah
Europium
Americium
Photonically Prepared
Photonically Enhanced§r

Machine parallels are based on Precise Casing Tier:

§6MK-I: §c8x§r
§6MK-II: §c16x§r
§6MK-III: §c32x§r
§6MK-IV: §c64x§r

§lTier §b2:§r

§aSupports Multi-Amp energy hatches§r
§c25%§r more outputs for every Wafer tier §oabove§r the minimum required.
The bonus to outputs occurs after parallels, but §9cannot be greater§r than §c100%§r
LV-LuV Solar Panels can be made without the previous panel, but at a higher cost.

§lTier §b3:§r

§aSupports Laser Energy hatches§r
Bonus per increased wafer tier is increased to §c50%§r
ZPM-UV Solar Panels can be made without the previous panel, but at a higher cost.
